short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert weather units on NYTimes.com to Celsius

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will convert weather units on NYTimes.com to Celsius.  There are currently no built-in settings on NYTimes.com to select metric units for weather.
